sentences.en: "I can't possibly comment on that," Paul said evasively.
sentences.cn: “我无法对此发表评论，”保罗闪烁其词地说。

sentences.en: "Ooh dear me, that's a bit of a racist comment isn't it."
sentences.cn: “嗬，天哪！那评论有点种族歧视，不是吗？”

sentences.en: Have you any comment to make about the cause of the disaster?
sentences.cn: 你对发生灾难的原因有何评论？

sentences.en: He was fined for making abusive comments to the referee.
sentences.cn: 他因谩骂裁判而被罚款。

sentences.en: He was vacationing and couldn't be reached for comment.
sentences.cn: 他当时正在度假，无法联系到他征求意见。

sentences.en: His recently completed chapel for Fitzwilliam is attracting favourable comment.
sentences.cn: 他最近为菲茨威廉建成的小教堂赢得了好评。

sentences.en: I don't really know so I could not pass comment on that.
sentences.cn: 我不了解实情，所以我不能就此发表意见。

sentences.en: I think he intended it as a put-down comment.
sentences.cn: 我认为他的评论有奚落贬低之意。

sentences.en: Mr Hicks is out of the country and so unavailable for comment.
sentences.cn: 希克斯先生目前不在国内，所以无法发表评论。

sentences.en: Mr Leach is on holiday and was not available for comment.
sentences.cn: 利奇先生休假了，不方便作出评论。

sentences.en: Neither Mr Rose nor Mr Woodhead was available for comment yesterday.
sentences.cn: 昨天罗斯先生和伍德黑德先生都无暇发表意见。

sentences.en: People were always commenting on his size.
sentences.cn: 人们总是对他的个子品头论足。

sentences.en: So far, Mr. Cook has not commented on these reports.
sentences.cn: 到目前为止，库克先生还未对这些报告进行过评论。

sentences.en: Stratford police refuse to comment on whether anyone has been arrested.
sentences.cn: 斯特拉福德警方拒绝对是否已有人被捕一事发表任何评论。

sentences.en: The blunt comment made Richard laugh in spite of himself.
sentences.cn: 这番率直的话让理查德不由自主地大笑起来。

sentences.en: The offending comment was in fact a heckle from an audience member.
sentences.cn: 这番冒犯性的话实际上是一名观众的诘难。

sentences.en: The results are a clear comment on government education policy.
sentences.cn: 这些结果是对政府教育政策明显的批评。

sentences.en: This practice embarrassed Luther, but he let it pass without comment.
sentences.cn: 这种做法让卢瑟难堪，但是他未置一词。

sentences.en: We won't dignify this kind of speculation with a comment.
sentences.cn: 这种猜测不值得我们作任何评论。

sentences.en: You really can't comment till you know the facts.
sentences.cn: 知道真相之前，不要发表任何意见。
